name: MovieQuizGame
0:
”Alexa, open Movie Quiz Game”
”Alexa, start Movie Quiz Game”
”Alexa, play Movie Quiz Game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie quiz game
des:
* Hundreds of films from selected classics to 2019 highest grossing hits.
* Over 100 animations titles.
* No bad or inappropriate languages involved in all the questions or quotes. A true family friendly game for everyone in the party!!
* Including movie trivia and fun facts.
* See how you well you know the movies compare to the rest of the world.

Think you’re so tough? Okay! I admit some of the questions are not easy, if you're up to the challenge that is.

Movies will be updated constantly.

Contact us for any suggestions and feedback at thunderborn.cloud@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
